general.name: spPlate
general.short: The spPlate files contain the combined spectra for all exposures of a given plate.
general.description: The spPlate files contain the combined spectra for all exposures of a given plate. There are typically four 900s exposures which may have been taken in a single night, or over multiple nights. This file is superceded in SDSS-V by the spField files.

surveys.name: eBOSS
surveys.description: A cosmological survey of quasars and galaxies to understand baryon acoustic oscillations

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

OBJID.name: OBJID
OBJID.description: Unique object id from SDSS imaging (run,rerun,camCol,field,id)

HOLETYPE.name: HOLETYPE
HOLETYPE.description: Hole ID in which the positioner is sitting

RA.name: RA
RA.description: Calculated on sky fiber RA including delta_RA

DEC.name: DEC
DEC.description: Calculated on sky fiber Dec including delta_DEC

MAG.name: MAG
MAG.description: [u, g, r, i, z] optical magnitudes

STARL.name: STARL
STARL.description: likelihood object is star (0-1, Plate OBJECT holes only)

EXPL.name: EXPL
EXPL.description: likelihood object is exponential disk (0-1, Plate OBJECT holes only)

DEVAUCL.name: DEVAUCL
DEVAUCL.description: likelihood object is deVaucouleurs profile (0-1, Plate OBJECT holes only)

OBJTYPE.name: OBJTYPE
OBJTYPE.description: Why object was targetted (QSO = Science Target)

XFOCAL.name: XFOCAL
XFOCAL.description: Hole x-axis position in focal plane per exposure

YFOCAL.name: YFOCAL
YFOCAL.description: Hole y-axis position in focal plane per exposure

SPECTROGRAPHID.name: SPECTROGRAPHID
SPECTROGRAPHID.description: Spectrograph to which the fibre is assigned. (SDSS-V: 1 = BOSS, 2 = APOGEE) or (SDSS-IV: 1=BOSS SP1, 2=BOSS SP2)

SCI_EXPTIME.name: SCI_EXPTIME
SCI_EXPTIME.description: Rescaled Science Exposure Time for offset plate

SOURCETYPE.name: SOURCETYPE
SOURCETYPE.description: indicate the nature of the source, one of STAR, QSO, GALAXY, or NA

BLUEFIBER.name: BLUEFIBER
BLUEFIBER.description: BOSS to assign this target a 'blue' fiber

ANCILLARY_TARGET1.name: ANCILLARY_TARGET1
ANCILLARY_TARGET1.description: Targeting bitmask for SDSS-III BOSS Ancillary

ANCILLARY_TARGET2.description: Targeting bitmask for SDSS-III BOSS Ancillary

RUN.description: SDSS imaging run, for SDSS imaging targets
